nctTree.desc: Jump from the slide to the top of the nearb tree to get the reward

nctTownMap.desc: Talk to tingle and buy the item from him for 20 ruppes

nctSwampMap.desc: Talk to tingle and buy the item from him for 40 ruppes

nctBombers.desc: Complete the bombers minigame as young Link, then go in and out of the sewers

nctOldLady.desc: Stop Sakon from robbing the poor old lady at 00:00 o the first day

nctGreatFairyHuman.desc: Rescue and return the Clock Town Lost Fairy as Young Link

nctGreatFairyTransform.desc: Rescue and return the Clock Town Lost Fairy as deku, goron or zora Link

nctPlayground.desc: Complete the deku playground and get the prize

nctKeaton.desc: Cut the Grass and answer the keaton correctly

nctMailBox.desc: Check the mailbox with the postman's hat on

wctMailBox.desc: Check the mailbox with the postman's hat on

wctBombBag.desc: Buy the item at the bom shop for 50 rupees

wctBigBombBag.desc: Stop the midnight robbery to buy it at the bomb shop, or buy it at the curiosity shop

wctSwordsman.desc: Complete the swordsman expert trial fopr 10 rupees

wctPostmansGame.desc: Win the Postmans minigame in the afternoon (Tip: use the bunny hood)

wctCuriosityShop.desc: Purcase the curiosity shop item foor 500 rupees (requires you to let the old lady get robbed)

wctRosa.desc: Use Kamaro's mask to teach the Rosa sisters Kamaro's dance

sctClockTower.desc: Climbe the clock tower to get the prize

sctBuisnessScrub.desc: Trade the moon's tear with the buisness scrub

sctStraw.desc: Jump-Slash under the straw roof to get on it

sctMailBox.desc: Check the mailbox with the postman's hat on

ectMailBox.desc: Check the mailbox with the postman's hat on

ectSewer.desc: Blast the broken wall to find a chest

ectAroma.desc: Talk to Madame Aroma On the first day

ectGalleryTop.desc: Jump from the top of the Milk Bar to the top of the shooting gallery

ectHoneyDarling.desc: Complete Honey & darlings minigame to win a prize

ectTownGallery.desc: Beat the town shooting gallery to win a prize

ectChestGame.desc: Use the goron mask to get a special prize for beating the chest minigame

ectMayor.desc: Use the couples mask to end the endless dispute

ectMailToMama.desc: Give mama the Priotity mail from Kafei

ectMailToPostMan.desc: Give the postman the Priority mail from Kafei

ectGorman.desc: Complete the sound check at the milk bar

spiReservation.desc: Check in to the inn on the first afternoon

spiMidnightMeeting.desc: Set up the midnight meeting in the afternoon, then talk to Anju in he kitchen at midnight

spiToiletHand.desc: Give the toilet hand some king of paper

spiStaffOnley.desc: Go to the staff onley room on the final night

spiKnifeChamber.desc: Use the key to enter the knife chamber

spiGranny1.desc: Listen to granny's first story and answer the question correctly

spiGranny2.desc: Listen to granny's second story and answer the question correctly

lpKafei.desc: Send the letter to Kafei and go into his house after he gets it

lpCuriosity1.desc: Meet the curiosity shop owner on the final day after Kafei leaves to chase Sakon

lpCuriosity2.desc: Meet the curiosity shop owner on the final day after Kafei leaves to chase Sakon

tfObservatory.desc: Look at the top o the clock town through the observatory's telescope

tfDodongos.desc: Defeat all the dodongos in the grotto

tfPillar.desc: Climb the pillar and enter the grotto on top

tfStorageScrub.desc: Spot the scrub flying out of Clock Town, follow him to his secret storage and pay him

tfGrassChest.desc: Open the chest hidden in the tall grass

tfGrassGrotto.desc: Follow the butterflies and find the secret grotto

tfStumpChest.desc: Use the bean to climb the stump, or hookshot to the chest

tfPeahat.desc: Enter the grotto at day and defeat the peahat insoide

tfWaterChest.desc: Dive underwater and open the chest

tfBioBaba.desc: Blast the rock, enter the grotto and dive underwater

tfGossips.desc: Solve the gossip stones riddle to get the reward

tfKamaro.desc: Heal Kamaro at night to get his reward
